titleStmt.title: The last judgment, or, A discourse shewing the reasonableness of the belief of such a thing deliver'd in a sermon, at the assizes held for the county of Denbigh, on the 18th of April, anno 1682 / by John Oliver ...
titleStmt.author: Oliver, John, d. 1730.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Minshull ... and Ric. Chiswell ...,
